definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Fireworks welcomed the new year in moscow's red square.
sentences.chinese: 人们在莫斯科红场燃放烟花庆祝新年。

sentences.english: I hope you HAs a maximum glad or prosperous New Year.
sentences.chinese: 谨祝新年愉快开心，大吉大利。

sentences.english: We'll toast to the New Year with a glass of bisho wine.
sentences.chinese: 让我们一起喝一杯加香料的果子酒，以贺新年。

sentences.english: We played on New Years eve day and then flew to Canada on New Years Day.
sentences.chinese: 我们新大打了一场竞赛，然后在新年飞到加拿大。

sentences.english: In SCB, dancing in the new year eve celerbration also.
sentences.chinese: 深圳渣打银行新年除夕晚会，舞蹈表演。

sentences.english: We usually have the celebration with feasts and firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 我们通常以丰盛的合家宴和鞭炮来庆祝新年。

sentences.english: Finally, again Happy New Year tvxq.
sentences.chinese: 最后，希望你们新年快乐。

sentences.english: "Before the matches he said that we can start the year loud, " said Kirilenko.
sentences.chinese: “比赛前他说我们要新年与众不同，”基里连科说。

sentences.english: Prudence is using the presents I have been getting as New Year gifts to tradesmen.
sentences.chinese: 普律当丝用我收到的新年礼物来送礼。

sentences.english: Good tiding for Christmas and a happy new year!
sentences.chinese: 祂祝福你新年常常平安愉快。

sentences.english: Hardly had I had time to say 'Goodbye' to the last year when the new year came here.
sentences.chinese: 还没有来得及辞旧岁，新年就已经来到了。

sentences.english: Wrm greetings nd biggest wishes for the New Yer!
sentences.chinese: 致以猛烈的祝贺和良好的祝福，新年快乐。

sentences.english: This year is also the 12th year of the French post office, La Poste, issuing Chinese New Year stamps.
sentences.chinese: 今年也是法国邮政局发行中国新年邮票第12年。

sentences.english: The traditional idea of wearing new clothes on the New Year's Eve no longer seems to hold sway.
sentences.chinese: 新年穿新衣的传统观念似乎不再占主导地位。

sentences.english: Wish you and your family a very happy new year.
sentences.chinese: 祝愿您及全家新年欢愉。

definition: the beginning of Spring/the 10 or 20 days following the lunar New Year's Day
Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
to step into the new year/New Year
